item.title: our world rules
item.description: Happy Valentines dayToday is my brothers birthday. Happy birthday dylan. for your birthday I got you a nuclear war threat. sweet huhI love the our leaders ability to really fudge certain things.. like the propaganda that they are spewing. it would be better if the propaganda didn’t fall apart within fifteen minutes of them presenting it. good propaganda and spin needs to last for the duration of the conflict. how are the america people let alone the U.
